name: Code Refactoring
description: Restructure existing code to improve readability, maintainability, and performance while preserving behavior.

examples.prompt: Refactor the legacy auth module to use dependency injection
examples.expected_behavior: Identifies tight coupling in the auth module, introduces interfaces, restructures initialization to accept dependencies, and verifies existing tests still pass

examples.prompt: Simplify this function that has grown too complex
examples.expected_behavior: Breaks the function into smaller focused functions, improves naming, removes dead code, and explains each change with rationale
